customer_reviews.title: Enjoy games, recommend for geeks
customer_reviews.text: It would have been 5 if not because of the package was so beat up when it arrived, i cant stand that. But the product is safe inside and new. This gamepad will work on some games only. so u have to have some skill to play a certain game with a help from a certain app. The instruction is somewhat confuse and i have some hardtime to understand several parts of it. The meterial is solid and the buttons look nice, the bluetooth connection is great. It may take sometime to figure out how to use buttons and things.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work like advertised and reviewed
customer_reviews.text: The product details say the controller can be used with a vast amount of games and some reviews say they can use it with all emulators. I did not have this luck. I did not have one compatible game and all emulators did not respond. When it did respond, one could use the bumpers to go in and out of folders, the left bumper to select things, and the buttons on the front of the controller do nothing.
